definition: tall rush with soft erect or arching stems found in Eurasia, Australia, New Zealand, and common in North America
details:
noun
- tall rush with soft erect or arching stems found in Eurasia, Australia, New Zealand, and common in North America
= synonyms: bullrush, common rush, soft rush
- tall marsh plant with cylindrical seed heads that explode when mature shedding large quantities of down
= synonyms: bullrush, cat's-tail, nailrod, reed mace, reedmace
